description: Bisection of Fibonacci triangle A037027: odd indexed members of column sequences of A037027 (not counting leading zeros).
comments: Row sums give A002450. Column sequences (without leading zeros) give for m=0..5: A001906, 2*A001870, A061182, 4*A061183, A061184, 2*A061185.Companion triangle (odd indexed members) A060920.
links: Yidong Sun, Numerical Triangles and Several Classical Sequences, Fib. Quart. 43, no. 4, Nov. 2005, pp. 359-370.
formula: a(n, m) = A037027(2*n+1-m, m).a(n, m) = (2*(n-m+1)*A060920(n, m-1)+2*(2*n+1)*a(n-1, m-1))/(5*m), n >= m>0; a(n, 0) := S(n, 3)=A001906(n+1) with Chebyshev's S(n, x) polynomials A049310; else 0.G.f. for column m >= 0: x^m*pFo(m+1, x)/(1-3*x+x^2)^(m+1), where pFo(n, x) := sum(A061177(n-1, m)*x^m, m=0..n-1) (row polynomials of signed triangle A061177).G.f.: 1/(1-(3+2*y)*x+(1+y)^2*x^2). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Oct 11 2003
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 20 2001
